data.oai_dc:dc: This data package contains data from the publication: Farwig, Nina, Schabo, Dana & Albrecht, Jörg (2016) Trait-associated loss of frugivores in fragmented forest does not affect seed removal rates. Journal of Ecology. Details about the content of the package can be found in the README.txt file and in the data_description.txt file in the zip folder.
Habitat fragmentation|response traits|effect traits|seed dispersal|mutualistic networks|plant-animal interactions
